entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 12.
